        public static Context getStoreContext(Object object)

        Parameters:
        uuid - Uuid
        object - to be stored

                         Store type)
                                  throws ContextException

        Parameters:
        uuid - Uuid
        type - one of: exertion, context, var, table, varModel, object
        Returns:
        retrieval Context
